<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 1"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Canopy Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=4000) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Vanara" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=368" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Impossible Lands](/Sources.aspx?ID=146) pg. 54

</column>

---

You can see equally well even in dense jungles where only a small amount of light shines through. You gain [low-light vision](/Rules.aspx?ID=416).
name: Canopy Sight
